title: Spinach Egg Omelette
steps: Beat the eggs with salt and pepper
Blench spinach then squeeze dry and cool
Mix egg and spinach
Heat a pan and add oil and mixture - low heat
Roll on pan

title: Rice Cooker Mushroom Chicken Rice
steps: Cut chicken into bite size pieces and season with sauces
Slice mushrooms
Oil bowl then add rice, water, chicken, mushrooms to rice cooker and cook
Add sesame oil 2 min before serve

title: Red Braised Pork Belly
steps: Wash pork belly and dry and dice in big cubes
Heat pork in pot without oil in low heat
Add lump sugar
Add spices then wine then hot water
Simmer for at least 40 min
Uncover and increase heat to reduce sauce until thickened

title: Lettue with Oyster Sauce
steps: Cut lettuce into big pieces and wash
Blench lettuce in boiling water with salt and oil then drain
Mix sauces
Fry garlic and heat sauce
Pour sauce on top of lettuce

title: Salmon Zosui
steps: Cut all vegatables into small slices
Minimal oil to fry salmon, tear skin, cool
Fry mushroom, then all veg, add soy sauce and water and salt and sugar
Add salmon belly
Add sesame and rice
Add rest of salmon
Crush salmon skin into flakes and add with sesame and green onion

title: Pasta alla Norma
steps: Cut eggplant and courgette into cubes and salt and pepper
Roast 240 oC or fry until brown and drain
Cook pasta al dente
Fry onion, garlic, then add wine, tomato passata, herbs, pepper flakes, salt and pepper and simmer
Stir in veg then pasta
Serve with parmesan and pepper

title: Fried Vermicelli
steps: Soak vermicelli in warm water until soft then drain
Beat eggs
Cut veg into thin strips
Heat oil then scramble eggs then set aside
Fry mince, season
Add carrot then other veg, then vermicelli, egg, season with sauces, stir fry

title: Mapo Tofu
steps: Cut tofu into cubes and boil in salted water then drain
Season mince with garlic and ginger and salt and soy sauce
Mix sauce
Heat oil then fry peppercorn then remove
Add mince mixture and chilli bean paste and dried chilli and wine
Add tofu and sauce mixture and gently mix, simmer
Garnish with paprika and green onion

title: Stir-Fried Shredded Beef with Green Peppers
steps: Cut chilli into thin strips
Cut beef into slices and marinate with wine, salt, pepper, sugar, soy sauces, sesame oil, corn starch, water, then little egg and corn starch (rest of egg can be used to fry rice)
Fry beef half-way
Fry garlic then add oyster sauce and chilli to stir fry
Add water, soy sauce, salt then corn starch and beef until sauce thickens
Add sesame oil and green onion

title: Sliced Beef in Hot and Sour Soup
steps: Cut all ingredients
Blench enoki mushroom and drain
Blench sliced beef in boiling water with ginger and cooking wine
Heat oil then fry ginger and garlic
Add tomato then water to boil
Add salt, soy sauce, oyster sauce, wine
Add enoki mushroom and beef slices until fully cooked
Assemble dish with chilli, sesame, green onion toppings
Heat oil and pour

title: Kung Pao Chicken
steps: Cut chicken into bite size pieces and marinate with salt, wine, soy sauce, egg white, corn starch, sesame oil
Cut vegs into chunks
Mix sauce (vinegar, sugar, osyter sauce, wine, honey, green onion, water, sesame oil, corn starch)
Heat oil then peanuts
Same oil to fry peppercorn and dried chilli, remove
Same oil to fry chicken and set aside
Add chilli bean paste, garlic, then veg, then chicken
Add sauce mixture and stir fry
Add peanuts

title: Teppanyaki Noodle with Black Pepper Mushroom Sauce
steps: Dice all veg
Cook pasta al denta
Heat butter then fry garlic and onion
Fry one-sided egg and set aside
Fry onion, mushrooms, garlic and season with salt, pepper and add ketchup and butter
Add water, soy sauce, sugar, mixed herb and black pepper
Add corn starch mixture to thicken
Assemble in hot pan

title: Prawns and Vermicelli Pot
steps: Soak vermicelli in warm water until soft then drain
Season prawns with salt and pepper
Cut chinese leaf into chuncks
Heat oil to pour onto garlic and red chilli
Add soy sauce, salt, sugar, oyster sauce to mixture
Boil water and add chinese leaf and vermicelli until cooked
Add prawns
Add sauce mixture and simmer
Garnish with green onion

title: Braised Beef Brisket with Tomato and Potatoes
steps: Blench beef from cold water and wine and ginger
Cut veg into chunks
Heat oil then fry onion, ginger, garlic, then add veg, beef and hot water to cover
Add sauces and spices, simmer for 1 h
High heat to thicken
Garnish with green onion

title: Kimchi Fried Rice
steps: Cut kimchi into small pieces
Fry mince
Add kimchi, then soy sauce, set aside
Beat eggs then scramble eggs, fry with rice
Add sauces and green onion
Garnish with sesame and green onion and sesame oil

title: Pad Kaphrao
steps: Separate egg yolk from white and fry one-sided egg, set aside
Fry mince, garlic, add sauces, red chili and basil, stir fry
Assemble

title: Red Lentil Dahl
steps: Cut veg into small pieces
Heat oil then fry onion, garlic, ginger
Add curry powder, cumin, paprika, tumeric, ground coriander and toast
Add broth or water, canned tomato, coconut milk, and dried red lentils, then season with salt and pepper, and simmer for 30 min
Add garam masala
Garnish with coriander and lime juice
